attributes.action: provide legislation to protect patients from unsafe medical injections
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hepatitis, HIV and other diseases are spread when syringes and needles are reused or used incorrectly. This problem is acute in developing countries but also exists in the UK. We ask that the Prime Minister show international leadership by requiring auto disable syringes and safe injection education be employed in the National Health Service. These prevent cross-infection and avoid disease.
